name: SurfaceCurvature
author: ANTs Developers
description: The Shape Operator for Differential Analysis of Images. It can operate on binary or gray scale images with various modes to see different effects.

inputs.name: Input Image
inputs.description: The input image file in .nii format.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The output image file in .nii format.

inputs.name: Operation Option
inputs.description: The operation mode: 0 for mean curvature, 5 for surface characterization, 6 for Gaussian curvature, and 7 for surface area.
